thread.section_title: Temple & Webster Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Temple & Webster | templeandwebster.com.au
thread.title: Ros Rigby
thread.title_full: Temple & Webster reviewed by Ros Rigby

author: Ros Rigby
title: Ros Rigby
text: After having an awful time with another online home wares business, I was wary of ordering again. I was concerned when an email came a few days after ordering that my purchase was on its way as surely this was too fast. I immediately phoned to confirm that this was not an error and was delighted by the efficiency of the staffer to whom I spoke. I was assured that if there was a problem in any way, it would be rectified. The next day my order was delivered. Absolutely will be purchasing again and again - thank you Temple and Webster team!
